name: Path Of Exile - Cleaner And Better Readability
description: Cleaner theme with better readability for PathOfExile.com.
additional_info:
1.0 / 19.7.2018 - Initial release
1.1 / 20.7.2018 - Fixed avatar and profile box width for long character names
1.2 / 20.7.2018 - Tweaked private messages section
1.3 / 22.7.2018 - Fixed "profile name" and "credits" for long values
1.31 / 6.8.2018 - Slight fix with header height making navigation buttons more accessible
1.32 / 15.8.2018 - Fixed private messages list height
